revised_title: The Thursday's Club and Its Relation to the Royal Society Club
tldr: This article discusses the history of the Thursday's Club, also known as the Club of the Royal Philosophers, and its relationship with the Royal Society Club. The author explores the club's origins, membership, and the reasons behind the change in its name and the eventual formation of a rival club. The article provides insights into the social and cultural aspects of 18th-century British science and the role of these clubs in fostering scientific communities.
